name: Panda!🐼
greetingText: Ye naam jyada achha hai btw!😉
wishText: You smile makes me blush, your laugh makes me happy, your love makes me feel special. I love you so much!💞
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to my love❤!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if this made you feel special🤩
replayText: Beacuse thats what I wanted to do!😉
